ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: NGO has been working for right to information, awareness for HIV/AIDS. It has played many nukkad(street) plays on female foeticide . we have organized many lectures on Human rights in NSS/NCC camps and in colleges too. Last year NGO has organized body donation camp under medical college KGMC, LUCKNOW and more than 130 people donated their body with pledge. NGO had organized a national seminar on HUMAN , HUMANITY AND DISCRIMINATION IN INDIA ON 21st March 2012 on world discrimination day. An international seminar on future of Human rights......is proposed in December 9th &10th . NGO is working on child education successfully . our main aim is to aware people for their rights which could make a better India in holestic manner

ngoList.title: Nand Educational Foundation for Rural Development
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Due to climate change uncertainties of monsoon have quite increased leading to frequent flood drought and salinity. Eastern UP being largely a rainfed area it has become still more vulnerable to climate change. Our efforts have led to release and promote a number of stress tolerant crop varieties against flood drought and salinity and this helped improve and stabilize productivity of this region. Large scale seed production have also been started largely by farmers to meet their requirements.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Purpose of project was demonstration and dissemination of stress tolerant crop varieties to raise and stabilize systems productivity in salt flood and drought affected areas of eastern UP. Also improving farmer self sufficiency in seed by improving their scales in seed production and develop entrepreneurship. Finally our aim was to start a farmer-led seed production and processing unit and develop viable seed producers cooperative to ensure availability of seeds of stress tolerant varieties.
